title: Univers Alternative
content:
Hi, Is there a free alternative to Univers 65 Bold? I need it to match the letter q. Not many fonts have a letter Q like that.

Many Thanks,
author: ostorey

comments.content: Not free but perhaps you own an older version of Corel Draw. The equivalent there would be _Zurich_ from Bitstream.

Thanks, I have purchased an old version of corel draw via ebay. When I recieve it, it should come with zurich pre-installed, right?

thanks,

I think the fonts are a part of the CD, so you have to install them separately. You get a lot of fonts with Corel, so it would slow down your system, if all were installed automatically during the software installation â€¦
